CutSceneText.Text: Aion was served by the Jotun,
I'd always thought the Jotun were just a myth,
but I may be wrong about that. According to this document...
...the Dragonbound are after the Energy Source
of an ancient Jotun creation, a powerful weapon of some sort.
But they seem to be having a hard time...because the Jotun are guarding it.
An Energy Source like this would surely hold tremendous power.
Little wonder that the Balaur are manipulating the Dragonbound to get it.
You must deal with the Jotun and the Dragonbound to recover this Energy Source.
It must not fall into the hands of the Balaur.
